error.message: Class Drupal\Console\Core\Command\Command not found and could not be autoloaded.
Class Drupal\Console\Core\Command\Command not found and could not be autoloaded.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to image_sizes.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
